title: Nalgene Water Bottle
description: Cheep, lasts forever and free of BPA

title: Crocs Shoes
description: Those work inside the house but also in nature they last a long time

title: O'Keeffe's Working Hands Hand Cream
description: Hand care that heals dry hands without being greasy

title: Meindl Island MFS Active
description: Actually waterproof without being sweaty, comfortable and last a long time

title: Leatherman Wave+
description: The Leatherman Wave+ is the undisputed king of multitools. With 18 tools, one-handed operation, and a 25-year warranty, it redefines durability and value.

title: Lenovo Thinkpad T480 (and others)
description: Robust and a keyboards that are fun to use, the T480 is the last one that is really repairable

title: Lenovo Thinkpad T480 (and others)
description: Robust and a keyboards that are fun to use, the T480 is the last one that is really repairable

title: Steelcase Gesture
description: Comfy while healthy for your back, no wear after many years, still you can get replacement parts

title: Apple iPhone
description: While it is expensive you will get updates for quite a long time and can get e.g. your battery replaced

title: Dyson V12
description: Shows the dust and get's rid of it reliably

title: Lavazza Coffee Beans
description: Still affordable and tastes great if coffee is not your only hobby

title: Ankarsrum Assistent Original 6230
description: The Ankarsrum Assistent Original 6230 embodies low time preference through its exceptional 20+ year durability and 7-year warranty, innovative rotating bowl design with a powerful 1500-watt motor for efficient heavy-duty tasks, superior Swedish craftsmanship that minimizes waste and repairs, and outstanding value that amortizes its premium price by replacing multiple lesser appliances, ultimately promoting rational consumption, planetary relief, and civilizational progress in health and sustainability.

title: ESGE-Zauberstab
description: The ESGE-Zauberstab is an iconic Swiss hand blender, renowned since 1954 for its exceptional durability and efficiency, ensuring reliable high performance, easy handling, and quick cleaning in both professional and home kitchens.

title: Fritzbox 7490
description: This and many other Fritboxes are reliable entrypoints into the internet that are supported for a long time. Just make sure you don't get it with an ISP-branded firware
